title: apiTester
description: API Tester is a simple web application built with React and TypeScript that allows users to test RESTful API endpoints directly from their browser. Its design is minimal and user-friendly, enabling quick requests and response inspection for developers who need a lightweight API testing tool.

title: simple to do app
description: a simple task manager that uses localstorage to store tasks . you can add . update and complete tasks . you can sort and search in the list of tasks . there is a data visualisation section . it has custom themes and supports dark mode

title: country quiz app
description: that was a challenge from devchallenges.io with purpose of testing your knowledge about countries . it fetches questions from an api and displays in in a nice ui and dependent on your answers it shows you finally your result . nice practise complex state management and tanstack query library

title: fullstack todo app
description: my first fullstack project . created with MERN stack and uses JWT for authentication . it has a user authentication system . users can create . update and delete their tasks . it has a dark mode and custom themes
